text: I do not support a constitutional amendment to prohibit gay marriage.
author: Corrine Brown

text: Marriage has historically been in the domain of the States to regulate.
author: Corrine Brown

text: I've always believed the two best anti-poverty programs are work and marriage.
author: Jim Talent

text: The old welfare system was hurting people by discouraging work and marriage. Welfare reform, and now this legislation, will build on the understanding that work and strong families are the foundation upon which we build our future.
author: Jim Talent

text: I think that marriage is an amazing institution and should be preserved, and you can have great marriages, and you must because sharing your life with someone is like the greatest thing. And I loved being able to set a good example for that on television.
author: Jenna Elfman
